name: 夜孤城 · 何为侠义
description:
"NightStar" is an independent and fictional work with the dynamic world and the feelings of the homeland.
The whole work is based on the thoughts of "Confucianism, literary, and System".
It tells the stories of resentment between the students and the teachers, the scribes and the warriors, and the courtiers and princes.

Game Background
Several warriors sneaked into the city by night.
Or persuade the defender as a lobbyist; or wait for an opportunity as a waiter; or as a traitor.
A number of loyalists are observing the ancient city and protecting the leader of city.
The only prefect is the highest sergeant who controls the situation in the entire city.

Game Plot
The affairs of the various scholars are carried out around the ancient city.
A hero in the chaos, a long-term confrontation between the resisters and the defenders.
They who have different personalities and opinions conflict with each other.
The player's own personality determines the ultimate fate of the character.

Game Content
In this game, the player will play a warrior.
By interacting with other characters, the player will complete the task through his own abilities.
Basic character attribute system and different styles of equipment is the condition of success.
In addition, the player need to work with other characters,otherwise he can't beat a powerful defender.
The player need to constantly explore the map,collect items,and make new friends.

Game Feature
  • Interesting immediate identity setting.
  • Broad urban landscape.
  • A wide variety of items and props.
  • Thrilling city adventure.
  • Different character that has unique personality.

Game Characteristic
Game characters are randomly generated based on the temperament.
Game characters can talk to each other, work together, build a home, and build a career.
Game characters have their own unique personality and ability, and have their own desire to continue to work hard.
